import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { getCategories } from '../../../api/categoryAPI' import Footer from '../../../components/Footer' import Navbar from '../../../components/Navbar' import AdminSidebar from '../AdminSidebar' const Category = () => { const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { getCategories() .then(data => { if (data.error) { console.log(data.error) } else { setCategories(data) } }) }, []) return ( <>
